home.title: CCTV Magic: Transform Your Security Camera Photos into AI Videos
home.subtitle: Turn your security camera photos into fun, realistic, and viral videos.
home.heroTitle: Transform Your CCTV Photos into Magical Videos
home.heroDescription: Transform any security camera image into a hyperrealistic animation: Santa visiting your home, elves making mischief, Christmas characters, and much more.
home.realisticVideosDesc: We use Sora and advanced models to extend your image's scene without looking edited. Maintains style, lighting, angles, and CCTV aesthetic.
home.perfectForHolidaysDesc: Santa, Elf-on-the-Shelf, toys, elves, gifts, magic... whatever you want happens inside your home. Results look like they came from your own cameras.
home.surpriseFamilyDesc: Turn a serious image into an epic video that everyone will share.
home.easyFastAutomaticDesc: Just upload your photo → choose a scene → receive a video ready to share.
home.step1Desc: Security cameras, Ring, Nest, Hikvision, Wyze... any camera works.
home.step2Desc: Santa, two mischievous elves, elves throwing toilet paper, toys coming to life, etc.
home.step3Desc: The scene extends while respecting: colors, CCTV noise, lighting, original perspective, real character sizes.
home.step4Title: Receive Your Video in under 2 minutes
home.step4Desc: Your video is ready to download and share instantly.
home.pricingDesc: Choose the perfect plan for your needs. All plans include the same powerful AI models.
home.pricingExamplesDesc: Real examples of CCTV Magic transformations
home.examplesDesc: See what's possible with CCTV Magic

form.title: Generate AI Video
form.description: Create stunning videos from text prompts and images
form.chooseTemplate: Choose a template or write your own...
form.templateSelected: Template selected. You can modify the prompt above or choose a different template.
form.promptPlaceholder: Describe the video you want to generate, or select a template above...
form.promptPlaceholderSimple: Describe the video you want to generate...
form.noPeopleWarningDesc: Sora blocks video generation when people are detected in images. Please ensure your reference image does not contain any people.
form.dimensionsLocked: Dimensions locked to match reference image
form.soundEffectNote: Add a sound effect to the video
form.generationInProgress: Video generation in progress. This may take up to 2 minutes. Please wait...
form.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.
form.imageCroppedDesc: Image has been cropped and resized successfully.
form.imageRemovedDesc: Please upload and crop an image to use it as a reference.
form.dimensionsUpdatedDesc: Dimensions set to {dimensions} based on image orientation.
form.errorLoadingImageDesc: Failed to load image. Please try again.
form.errorProcessingImageDesc: Failed to process image. Please try again.
form.insufficientCreditsDesc: This model requires {cost} credit{plural}. You have {credits}.
form.insufficientCreditsError: Insufficient credits. This model requires {cost} credit{plural}. Please purchase more credits.
form.dimensionMismatchDesc: Image dimensions ({imageDims}) don't match selected dimensions ({targetDims}). Please crop the image first.
form.imageErrorDesc: Image preview exists but file is missing. Please upload and crop the image again.
form.videoGeneratedDesc: Your video is ready to view and download. Please refresh the page to see the video.
form.videoGenerationStartedDesc: Your video is being generated. This may take a few moments.
form.checkProfile: Check your profile page for updates.
form.generationFailedDesc: Failed to generate video. Please try again.
form.generationTimeoutDesc: Video generation is taking longer than expected. Check your profile page.
form.generationFailedTryAgain: The video generation failed. Please try again. Remember that people are not allowed in images.
form.noCreditsMessage: You need credits to generate videos
